Description: For sale is a 1984 Yamaha SBG3000 White with Kahler with non original case. This instrument is in excellent condition and in perfect working order. There are some light scratches, dings, and a little wear on the back. It is missing the top of one of the tone knobs. There is also some clear coat blushing on the front of the headstock, and some finish checking near the nut. Overall, I would give it a solid 8.5 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original, aside from the Kahler and the locking nut. There are no cracks, repairs, or major issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with minor wear. The non original case works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.66" 1st Fret: 0.77" 12th Fret: 0.94" Neck Type: Thin Finger Board: Ebony Pickups: Original Spinex Humbuckers Weight: 10lb 8oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart. I have provided tons of pictures. Please check them out. Utah residents please add 7% sales tax. Please call, text, or message me if you have any questions 18013179013. This item does ship worldwide. All items are shipped with full insurance and signature confirmation so there is no risk for you the buyer. I am very familiar with shipping internationally. This item will be packed very safe and secure. International buyers are responsible for any import duties. International purchases will ship UPS. Please use the shipping calculator for a shipping quote. Shipping anywhere is continental USA is $70 via UPS ground. All shipping comes with full insurance and signature confirmation so there is no risk for you the buyer.
